<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Tab panel content container

## Properties

| Property             | Attribute | Description                          | Type     | Default     |
| -------------------- | --------- | ------------------------------------ | -------- | ----------- |
| `value` _(required)_ | `value`   | Value matching the corresponding tab | `string` | `undefined` |

| ---- | ------------------------------ |
|      | Default slot for panel content |
